title: Looking for Web Developer to Create Landing Page Website (from Ukraine or Russia)
snippet:
We're looking for a web developer to create a simple yet professional looking landing page website for us.

This site is to sell a digital product.

Needs to have functionality of:
•Professional landing page
•Payment function
•Email lead collection + auto responder
• Simple Privacy policy page + terms of use page

We want the landing page exactly like this:
https://marketplace.leadpages.net/sastranababan/book-perfect-landing-page-to-sell-your-book/

Budget is $25usd.

Interested candidates kindly send in your past works.
